user_query: I'm a developer building a web application that requires proxy detection functionality. Can you suggest a proxy detection API that can identify if an IP address is associated with a proxy? Additionally, I would like to obtain the current traffic balance for my residential proxies to monitor my usage.

TaskList.description: Research and identify a suitable proxy detection API that provides functionality to check if an IP address is associated with a proxy.
Implement the selected proxy detection API in the web application to test if an IP address is a proxy.
Query the current traffic balance for the residential proxies to monitor usage effectively.
Integrate traffic balance monitoring functionality into the web application.
